metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6199 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ObjectSocketWrapper.java in Gradle 2.12 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted serialized object.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-6199` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gradle - 2.13-4
libgradle-core-java - 2.13-4
libgradle-plugins-java - 2.13-4
No subscription required

notes.Note: pfsmorigo> GUI was deprecated after version 4.0

criterions.comment: gradle package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.13-4').
